data.title: Transfer to Regent University
data.meta_description: Transfer from TCC to Regent University. Learn how you can start at TCC, transfer to Regent University and save thousands in the process.
data.text:
The college has specific agreements with some colleges and universities to benefit our students. The Virginia Community College System also works diligently on behalf of all students who attend one of Virginia’s 23 community colleges — to include TCC students. See the link(s) below for detailed agreement information.

If you cannot access the PDF documents on this page, please complete the Report a Barrier form, and we will provide assistance as soon as possible.

How to select the appropriate agreement

Select the transfer agreement that corresponds to the catalog year you started your TCC program. Catalog year refers to the academic year you BEGAN your TCC program. For example, if you started in Fall 2019 or Spring 2020, you will select the agreement that corresponds with catalog year 2019.

Transfer Guide

See how your TCC courses may transfer to Regent University.

Transfer Pathways

Associate of Applied Science: Early Childhood Development

to Bachelor of Science: Interdisciplinary Studies (PreK-3)

Catalog Year: 2018

Associate of Applied Science: Criminal Justice

to Bachelor of Science: Criminal Justice (Corrections Concentration)

Catalog Year: 2018

Associate of Applied Science: Criminal Justice

to Bachelor of Science: Criminal Justice (Homeland Security Concentration)

Catalog Year: 2018

Associate of Applied Science: Criminal Justice

to Bachelor of Science: Criminal Justice (Law Enforcement & Administration Concentration)

Catalog Year: 2018
